title: GD Coffee
slogan: Like Starbucks, but nothing like Starbucks

pages.title: Home
pages.content: Come to GD Coffee for the coffee. Leave because you have your coffee.

pages.title: About
pages.content: GD Coffee was founded in 2016 when Travis Rigg got annoyed at how much work went into ordering a small black coffee. He had to say 'I want a small black coffe.' What a pain. It would be so much easier if there was a coffee house that only had one item: a cup of coffee. GD Coffee seeks to offer that solution. Walk up to the counter, say a number, hand over twice as many dollars as that number, receive that number of cups of coffee.'

pages.title: Locations
pages.content: Currently GD Coffee is closed because Travis Rigg yelled at a customer for asking for creamer.

pages.title: Testimonials
pages.content: Jack Kemps of Lewisberg said... 'I asked for creamer and the owner yelled at me.'

pages.title: FAQ
pages.content:
**Q**: Can I have some creamer? 
**A**: NO!
